Text:
[V] Into Your hands, LORD, to you I entrust my spirit.
[R] Into Your hands, LORD, [*] to you I entrust my spirit.
[V] For You have redeemed us, LORD, God of truth.
Notes: We added the phrase 'to you' in the first line. This improves the smoothness when repeated.
Changes: 2023-10-16 - Paul Prins: Smooth out shortened phrase.
2023-08-14 - Paul Prins: Updated the versicles to match our Psalm 31:5.
2022-08-05 - Paul Prins: Update response to more closely follow the latin.
